channel.title: How do I install mobile wallet APK on android
channel.description:
Until the google play store releases the wallet for download we have made it available for download on our own downloads section.
Download the APK to your phone
Go to the android **downloads** folder (default folder where downloads go)
Click on the .apk you just download
If you get a **unknown sources** problem please do the following steps first and click on .apk file again
For newer version of Android OS Step 1 – Go to Settings. Step 2 – Go to Security. Step 3 – Scroll down and check “Unknown sources” box. Step 4 – Tap "OK" when it show the warning.
The above steps might differ from the above depending on the actual distribution or modifications done on your phone.

For newer version of Android OS

Step 2 – Go to Security.
Step 3 – Scroll down and check “Unknown sources” box.
Step 4 – Tap “OK” when it show the warning.

The above steps might differ from the above depending on the actual distribution or modifications done on your phone.
